title: Reference jewels
text: I have reffered my friend. She have joined the Jupiter. created account too. I didnâ€™t received the jewels.

replies.text: Hello Pournima, we are here to help you, and we have reached out to you through direct message to address the issue. Letâ€™s connect there.

posts.text: I have reffered my friend. She have joined the Jupiter. created account too. I didnâ€™t received the jewels.
Hello Pournima, we are here to help you, and we have reached out to you through direct message to address the issue. Letâ€™s connect there.

title: â€˜connect with googleâ€™ option in external funds
text:
I had previously asked an issue about the same (got no rply): Lab test #3 - Investments on Jupiter (Early release and testing)ğŸ’° - #64 by Aswin_Benny
THere should be a manual option to update the external funds. Connecting to google and reading emails might feel uncomfortable to someâ€¦
Same issue as i explained on previous post eventhough i connected my google account â€¦ My insights is not refreshed as of today.

replies.text: Adding one more bug. Today morning i got a CAMS mail like usual i forwarded it to jupiter (jupiter was not automatically updating)â€¦ Now i am getting incorrect password error  Like report had different password
Hey @Aswin_Benny This is being looked into

Hey @Aswin_Benny ! Thank you for raising both the issues 
For the first point, you can still do it manually. Click on View insights report, then click on the ? in the top right, and click refresh! From there you will be able to choose whether to refresh with Google or manual. Just as an FYI - your email data is extremely secure. We only use the access to fetch your CAMS statement! Definitely connect with Google for a superior experience.
For the second, about the Incorrect password error, let me look into that! For now can you try forwarding your statement again?
Thanks again for raising the issues and your patience with us!

Hey @Aswin_Benny ! We double checked your error and I think that statement was not generated by us! That is why our system is giving the erorr. Maybe it was generated by CRED or INDMoney if you have those apps.
You can double check by opening the PDF and checking if the password â€œjupiter123â€ works. Try going through the flow again on the app, and we can generate a new statement for you with the correct password!
Yes the password couldnt open itâ€¦ I cannot check it manually now because the whole page is showing â€œincorrect passwordâ€ error.

Haha, our mistake then! We can make the flow simpler to use.
Tell me - what email ID do you use to receive CAMS statements on? I can generate a statement for you manually. When you receive that - forward it to investments@jupiter.money and then it should refresh and fix this for you.
I will send it in DM

Done! Apologies for the delay
Check your email
Yes. thanks for helping forwarded the mail and screen is back again. Can i expect it to update itself once in a month or something?

If you enable google then yes 
If not, you will have to manually forward the statement once a month. When your report is 30 days old you should get a prompt though!
Has the external mutual funds option disabled ? As i donâ€™t see the option now
I think so.
Its there. I thought akash was talking about that connect with google button

I was checking in the money section where my external mutual fund used to show, but suddenly i could only see option from jupiter mutual fund, there was no external one, but the option you have mentioned that worked and i am able to connect my external mutual fund by forwarding option
connect to google method never worked for me
I am unable to select the connect with google option now. Yesterday i got the option to give access to my google account after which it didnâ€™t work
@Mslatewalla Can you please share your contact details? I want to understand the issue you faced. cc @Shawnpinto
donâ€™t share your private details in a public chat

title: We are unable to add Jupiter account or debit card to patm, gpay, phonepe
text: We are unable to add jupiter account number, debit card to gpay phonepe paytm

replies.text:
May be you are doing something wrong. Everything fine for us. If you are adding your debit card then do not forget to turn the ecom or online transaction on for the card verification with â‚¹2 refundable withdrawal.
Could you exactly say what error is popping up?

posts.text: We are unable to add jupiter account number, debit card to gpay phonepe paytm

May be you are doing something wrong. Everything fine for us. If you are adding your debit card then do not forget to turn the ecom or online transaction on for the card verification with â‚¹2 refundable withdrawal.
Could you exactly say what error is popping up?

title: Feedback around Payments
text:
Hey guys! Weâ€™re looking to get some feedback and ideas from you around the payments on Jupiter- Debit Cards, UPI and Bank Transfers.
Let us know if you have any inputs in the comments below!

replies.text: Upi ever time technical error please improve this.
Can we get more NEFT  & IMPS are free ?
Hey @Mihika_Tummalapalli, Iâ€™m a big fan of the OneCardâ€™s â€˜Swipe to Payâ€™ feature  OneCard- Swipe to Pay

Btw, are you going to implement this upcoming UPI redressal mechanism or is it Axis being the PSP bank? 

  
    
    
    Fintech News Bytes General
  
  
    Awesome-UPI-sauce! 
According to NPCI MD and CEO Dilip Asbe, the upcoming in-app feature is expected to resolve 80-90% of payment failures in real time. The feature will make its debut in September 2022. 
NPCI To Roll Out Real-Time Payment Dispute Resolution For UPI Soon
Also, a fan of Visa Safe Click (VSC) elsewhere when I donâ€™t â€˜Swipe to Payâ€™ One-Click Payments & Checkout | Visa Safe Click

Me too broâ€¦ Jupiter has to have it.
Along with fingerprint authentication for upi payments.
Basics- being fast, reliable and stable option for payments. Jupiter needs to focus on basics first.

I came across a video that involves carding and those guys takes advantage of Visa, mastercards without otp to crry out the fraudâ€¦ They prefer US and such countries stating the dont have OTP protectionâ€¦
How safe will it be without OTP protection?

VSC is considered safe with Visaâ€™s in-house threat engine and a secure validation system in place to authenticate transactions below INR 2000.
I canâ€™t vouch for their security though

Option to set-up UPI Pin/Reset with aadhar without Debit Card
        
          
    
      
        Agree?
          
    
          
              
                    
                Yes

          voters
        
      
        
            
              
              Results will be shown on vote.
            
            
              
              Votes are public.
I dont like this because I am still with OTP authentication because when I donâ€™t have my phone I can use my email to check the otp.

UPI

Self transfer (transfer in own different account via upi)
UPI Autopay
Biometric authentication for payment
Recharge and bill payments with offers

Debit cards

A UPI QR for receiving payments on card
Biometric authentication for pay online. No otp just as swipe to pay in onecard.

Bank transfer

Small avatars as dp for quick payee Identification.
Add money to jupiter account using debit card.

Jupiter â€œAll in Oneâ€ Feedback & Ideas
  
  
    Jupiter can add these options in App . 
A. UPI : 


Alternate UPI ID for more successful Txn. 
( Like GPay , PhonePe etc ) 


Extra UPI : Like Roshan@JupiterAxis 
(For Privacy concern,without sharing Number) 


Short UPI extension - @Jupiter only 


UPI Txn. With Fingerprint if possible to a fixed limit. 


Schedule Payment over UPI. 
( Ex- BHIM/FreeCharge UPI does) 


Self Transfer 


B. Bank Transactions : 


IMPS & NEFT ( or upto certain limit ) can Be done through Fingerprint. 


Automatic Pâ€¦
  


[spoiler]Might This post will be helpful?[/spoiler]



Jupiter â€œAll in Oneâ€

Jupiter can add these options in App .

Jupiter â€œAll in Oneâ€

Jupiter can add these options in App . A. UPI : Alternate UPI ID for more successful Txn. ( Like GPay , PhonePe etc )


Jupiter doesnâ€™t need to do this as itâ€™s a bank itself.

@Dhruv   Jupiter isnâ€™t Bank itself.
Itâ€™s Advanced Version of Mobile Banking with Next Level Feature cum separate supports.
See the Selected Text
Currently Jupiter doensâ€™t have many options what Iâ€™ve discussed there.

IMG_20220619_1353271080Ã—2184 282 KB
Phonepe and oaytm has started charging for rechargesâ€¦ I think mobile recharges and stuffs should be worked out in jupiter with high priority
It should be launched in couple of weeks itself.
Bill payments, hehe. This means another lab test folks

title: Jupiter themed debit card skins
text:
Hello! 
Have you ever heard of Debit card skins? Theyâ€™re like stickers for your card.
There were some discussions internally about having one but, weâ€™re still thinking about it 
Introducing-41080Ã—1080 109 KB
We wanted to hear the communityâ€™s thoughts about these as well. Do you own or used one before?
If you havenâ€™t seen any Debit card skins, here are some examples:
1569Ã—569 24.4 KB
Screenshot 2022-11-22 at 3.08.51 PM852Ã—566 32 KB
They come in 2 types.

Covers the whole card, like shown above or,
Covers everything else except the numbers and info, for example below.

Screenshot_2022-11-08-16-55-16-50_1c337646f29875672b5a61192b9010f91080Ã—733 44.7 KB
Some thoughts:

Itâ€™s better to have a full cover in our case since the space fire debit card is blank in the front and the numbers are behind.
We also think keeping the OG spacefire colour is needed since thatâ€™s what we started with and thatâ€™s how our users remember us. In this case, would it be better to keep translucent skin instead?
We wanted to keep this for special users. Community folks maybe? 

For example, gift box wraps. Some come in a faded translucent type with few patterns. But you can still see whatâ€™s underneath.
Also, hereâ€™s a similar concept shared by @Aswin_Benny
  
    
    
    NFC enabled stickers for phones Features
  
  
    Jupiter should have this feature(Not sure if it can be implemented ) . A sticker that can be pasted anywhere like phones / watches, which has nfc support . 
My phone doesnt support tap and pay. If this was an option I would certainly buy the sticker. To me it makes more sense than carrying a debit card 
 [image]
  


Share your thoughts below!
@trust_level_1

replies.text: Waiting to see some mockups . i got tired of the plane colour now

@Aswin_Benny Same! Weâ€™re actually making some for trying it out.
Canâ€™t seem to pick a colour though.
If youâ€™ve noticed, weâ€™ve been adding the â€˜spaceâ€™ theme everywhere in our communications, social media, in app design, etc.
Keeping this theme in mind,
        
          
    
      
        What theme should we pick for our Card skin?
          
    
          
              
                    
                Galaxy theme (Dark, minimal, with stars & rocket)
              
          
          
              
                    
                2 Spacemen floating in space, shaking their hands
              
          
          
              
                    
                Transparent theme with rockets and stars
              
          
          
              
                    
                Bug hunters/Community edition?
              
          
    
  
      
      
    
      
        
          101
          voters
        
      
        
            
              
              Choose up to 1 option.
            
            
              
              Results will be shown on vote.
            
            
              
              Votes are public.
            
        
    
  
      
          
            
            Vote now!

replies.user: å½¡ ğ•»ğ–Šğ–“ğ–“ğ–ğ–œğ–ğ–˜ğ–Š ğ•¿ğ–ğ–Š ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–ˆğ–ğ–“ğ–Œ ğ•®ğ–‘ğ–”ğ–œğ–“ å½¡
replies.text: Cool yaarâ€‹:thinking:! Could love to try it out as you know print on debit card comes out of card within fews uses! I donâ€™t know why bank is using such a kind of printer
All of my cards looks as if its new  I rarely use cards in atm. I use tap n pay mostly.

replies.user: å½¡ ğ•»ğ–Šğ–“ğ–“ğ–ğ–œğ–ğ–˜ğ–Š ğ•¿ğ–ğ–Š ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–ˆğ–ğ–“ğ–Œ ğ•®ğ–‘ğ–”ğ–œğ–“ å½¡
replies.text: I have never paid via Tap & Pay (till now) I just use them to withdrawn cash. Because most vendor still depends on cash.

I will prefer the other side on this one.
Like the colour. Usually the vendor takes a good look when I give it for payment. Secondly, I mostly use it for online transactions. Also, why are we talking about debit skins when there are other important matters like CREDIT CARDS!!

@maulik_satasiya I like your perspective!
Thinking about the back side of the card too. Good stuff.
It makes sense to flash your card and they only look at the front side first.
We are also working on a Credit card or a feature in the lending space! Itâ€™s WIP

replies.user: å½¡ ğ•»ğ–Šğ–“ğ–“ğ–ğ–œğ–ğ–˜ğ–Š ğ•¿ğ–ğ–Š ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–ˆğ–ğ–“ğ–Œ ğ•®ğ–‘ğ–”ğ–œğ–“ å½¡
replies.text: WIP means Work-in-progress? Right?

Think the translucent sticker is a rather nice idea, where in we can retain the unique color of the card too (stays true to your brand identity) and the translucent stickers could probably have customized illustrations that add to the pattern of the card
Eg - the way the card numbers are printed on the back side could be an extension of the portal gun illustration from rick and morty 
But would love a sticker fosho
This is a really cool idea, hadnâ€™t heard of it before. Would specially like it cause I could change it up every few months, keep the card looking fresh !
Slaypay has this concept.https://slaypay.app

To be honest. I have never used my Jupiter card outside since the launch.
There is no benifit or advantage of doing so over upi.
I believe you should go more towards utility and features rather than asthetic.
I donâ€™t see Jupiter doing anything extra they other nio banks canâ€™t.

I absolutely dig that cyberpunk design!!! Can we get it in neon?
Meanwhile Here are some recommendations for mock ups:
Rick n morty (no explanation. Iâ€™m too wasted.)
GOT/ House of Dragon (we could do different houses - like Starkâ€™ Chill,  Targaryen Fyre or Lannister Gold, etcâ€¦)
Terminator (I know the franchise has been beaten to the death, but cmon- give us a T-800)
Avatar (for the blue haired folks)
Shaktiman (PLEASE, at least for the street cred. Iâ€™ll pay â‚¹5000 a year for it)
Dragonball (YESSSS!!!)
Suits (Harvey Spector Uber cool for the premium corpos)
Okay ima get off my soapbox.

replies.user: å½¡ ğ•»ğ–Šğ–“ğ–“ğ–ğ–œğ–ğ–˜ğ–Š ğ•¿ğ–ğ–Š ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–ˆğ–ğ–“ğ–Œ ğ•®ğ–‘ğ–”ğ–œğ–“ å½¡

replies.text:
These skins can be sent in the onboarding box too like other stickers are there. Itâ€™s perfect place to share with new onboarding.
Maybe a premium or special category one can be offered as per the plans.

I also wantğŸ’¯ to own the credit card
From when we can get cc of Jupiter
.
.
And about the skin this is good idea but most of people will not buy these skin if these are paidâ€‹:money_mouth_face: but if they are freeâ€‹:heart_eyes: then everyone will loveâ€‹:star_struck: them I think

Itâ€™s pretty cool idea actually .
Iâ€™ll first show my friends who are using fi money and Iâ€™ll troll them .
Tbh Fi moneyâ€™s color choice of their card is cool, but overall design looks generic.
